title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 05, 2022

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Cryptocurrency

- API: [Hirak Exchange Rates](https://rates.hirak.site/)

  Description: Exchange rates between 162 currency & 300 crypto currency update each 5 min, accurate, no limits

  Auth: `apiKey`

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Unknown



### Entertainment

- API: [Techy](https://techy-api.vercel.app/)

  Description: JSON and Plaintext API for tech-savvy sounding phrases

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Unknown



### Environment

- API: [Website Carbon](https://api.websitecarbon.com/)

  Description: API to estimate the carbon footprint of loading web pages

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Unknown
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Web Frameworks

*   [Huma (⭐3.2k)](https://github.com/danielgtaylor/huma/) - Framework for modern REST/GraphQL APIs with built-in OpenAPI 3, generated documentation, and a CLI.
items.content_html:
Web Frameworks

  • Huma (⭐3.2k) - Framework for modern REST/GraphQL APIs with built-in OpenAPI 3, generated documentation, and a CLI.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Themes / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [cmder (⭐13)](https://github.com/potasiyam/cmder-zsh-theme) - A ZSH theme that matches the theme of Cmder, a popular terminal emulator for windows. Includes `node` and `git` status decorations.
*   [cn (⭐0)](https://github.com/shinqcn/cn-zsh/) - Includes `username`, `directory` and `git` status decorations.
items.content_html:
Themes / superconsole - Windows-only

  • cmder (⭐13) - A ZSH theme that matches the theme of Cmder, a popular terminal emulator for windows. Includes node and git status decorations.
  • cn (⭐0) - Includes username, directory and git status decorations.

items.title: Awesome Security
items.content_text:
### Web / Scanning / Pentesting

*   [Scanmycode CE (Community Edition)](https://github.com/marcinguy/scanmycode-ce) - Code Scanning/SAST/Static Analysis/Linting using many tools/Scanners with One Report. Currently supports: PHP, Java, Scala, Python, Ruby, Javascript, GO, Secret Scanning, Dependency Confusion, Trojan Source, Open Source and Proprietary Checks (total ca. 1000 checks)
items.content_html:
Web / Scanning / Pentesting

  • Scanmycode CE (Community Edition) - Code Scanning/SAST/Static Analysis/Linting using many tools/Scanners with One Report. Currently supports: PHP, Java, Scala, Python, Ruby, Javascript, GO, Secret Scanning, Dependency Confusion, Trojan Source, Open Source and Proprietary Checks (total ca. 1000 checks)

items.title: Awesome Agi Cocosci
items.content_text:
### Commonsense / Commonsense Knowledgebase

*   [Verbosity: A Game for Collecting Common-Sense Facts](http://www.aladdin.cs.cmu.edu/papers/pdfs/y2006/verbosity.pdf) - ***CHI'06***, 2006. \[[All Versions](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cluster=7793704394155465847\&hl=en\&as_sdt=0,5)].
*   [Designing games with a purpose](https://dl.acm.org/doi/fullHtml/10.1145/1378704.1378719) - ***Communications of the ACM***, 2008. \[[All Versions](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cluster=18332117920150730595\&hl=en\&as_sdt=2005\&sciodt=0,5)].
*   [Acquiring Comparative Commonsense Knowledge from the Web](https://people.mpi-inf.mpg.de/~ntandon/papers/aaai-2014-tandon.pdf) - ***AAAI'14***, 2014. \[[All Versions](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cluster=16641273554706459553\&hl=en\&as_sdt=0,5)].
items.content_html:
Commonsense / Commonsense Knowledgebase

  • Verbosity: A Game for Collecting Common-Sense Facts - CHI'06, 2006. [All Versions].
  • Designing games with a purpose - Communications of the ACM, 2008. [All Versions].
  • Acquiring Comparative Commonsense Knowledge from the Web - AAAI'14, 2014. [All Versions].
